entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kawartha Lakes (Lindsay)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.1°C

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this morning. Local blowing snow early this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 20 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 2.
